headline: Tell HN: Google Intercepting SMS
description: I'm probably late to this. Today, my Samsung phone started intercepting my SMS conversations to provide "chat" features: the typing dots and read receipts. It did it without my permission and without me installing any updated. In the settings there was a (I'm paraphrasing) "let google steal your data to enable rich chat" popup, that I clicked no to, and it appears to have gone away. I know iPhone already does this, personally I don't want it, and it's super unethical to just start intercepting SMS without opt-in.
description_zh-Hans: 我可能说得太晚了。今天，我的三星手机开始拦截我的短信对话，以提供"聊天"功能：打字点和阅读回执。它没有经过我的允许，也没有安装任何更新就这样做了。在设置中，有一个（我是转述）"让谷歌窃取你的数据以启用丰富的聊天"弹出窗口，我点击了拒绝，它似乎已经消失了。我知道iPhone已经这样做了，我个人并不希望这样，而且在没有选择的情况下就开始拦截短信是非常不道德的。
